query: select title from projects where start_year > 2018
question: Find projects that started after 2018

query: select title from projects where start_year < 2018
question: Find projects that started before 2018

query:
select institutions_name
from institutions inner join countries c on c.unics_id = institutions.country_id
where country_name = 'Italy'
question: Find institutions located in Italy

query:
select title
from projects inner join people on projects.principal_investigator = people.unics_id
where full_name = 'Alberto Broggi'
question: Find projects where Alberto Broggi was involved

query: select count(*) from projects where start_year = 2016
question: How many projects started in 2016?
What's the total cost of all projects?

query:
select p.title
from projects p
         inner join project_members pm on p.unics_id = pm.project
         inner join project_member_roles pmr on pm.member_role = pmr.code
         inner join institutions i on pm.institution_id = i.unics_id
         inner join countries c on i.country_id = c.unics_id
where pmr.code = 'coordinator'
  and c.country_name = 'Greece'
question: Find projects whose coordinator is from Greece

query:
select i.institutions_name
from project_members pm
         inner join project_member_roles pmr on pm.member_role = pmr.code
         inner join institutions i on pm.institution_id = i.unics_id
where pmr.code = 'coordinator'
question: Find institutions that have acted as a coordinator

query:
select pm.member_name
from projects p inner join project_members pm on p.unics_id = pm.project
where p.acronym = 'ALFRED'
question: List all the members of project ALFRED

query:
select p.title
from projects p inner join project_programmes pp on p.unics_id = pp.project
where pp.programme = 'FP7-ICT'
question: List all projects under the FP7-ICT programme

query:
select pmr.code
from projects p
         inner join project_members pm on p.unics_id = pm.project
         inner join project_member_roles pmr on pm.member_role = pmr.code
where p.acronym = 'ARGOS'
and pm.member_name like '%ATHENA%'
question: Find the role code of member with name containing 'ATHENA' in project with acronym ARGOS

query:
select pmr.code
from projects p
         inner join project_members pm on p.unics_id = pm.project
         inner join project_member_roles pmr on pm.member_role = pmr.code
where p.acronym = 'ARGOS'
and pm.member_name like '%ATHENA%'
question: Find the role of ATHENA in project ARGOS

query:
select i.institutions_name
from institutions i
         inner join countries c on c.unics_id = i.country_id
         inner join project_members pm on i.unics_id = pm.institution_id
         inner join activity_types a on pm.activity_type = a.code
where a.description = 'Research Organisations'
and c.country_name = 'Greece'
group by i.institutions_name
question: Return all research organisations located in Greece

query:
select p.title
from projects p
         inner join project_members pm on p.unics_id = pm.project
         inner join institutions i on pm.institution_id = i.unics_id
         inner join eu_territorial_units et on i.geocode_regions_3 = et.geocode_regions
where et.description = 'Schaffhausen'
question: Find all projects connected with institutes located in Schaffhausen area
